Mathematics for CSE Stream-I.description: Differential Calculus, Integral Calculus, Differential Equations, Infinite Series, Vector Calculus
modules: Differential Calculus - Limits, continuity, derivatives, applications of derivatives
Integral Calculus - Integration techniques, definite integrals, applications
Differential Equations - First-order equations, linear differential equations
Infinite Series - Taylor's and Maclaurin's series, convergence tests
Vector Calculus - Scalar and vector fields, gradient, divergence, curl

Applied Physics for CSE Stream.description: Wave Optics, Lasers and Fiber Optics, Quantum Mechanics, Crystal Physics, Semiconductor Physics
modules: Wave Optics - Interference, diffraction, polarization phenomena
Lasers and Fiber Optics - Laser principles, types, fiber optic communication
Quantum Mechanics - Wave-particle duality, Schr√∂dinger equation basics
Crystal Physics - Crystal structure, X-ray diffraction, band theory
Semiconductor Physics - p-n junctions, diodes, transistor fundamentals

Applied Chemistry for CSE Stream.description: Atomic and Molecular Structure, Thermodynamics and Electrochemistry, Materials Chemistry
modules: Atomic and Molecular Structure - Electronic configuration, chemical bonding
Thermodynamics and Electrochemistry - Laws of thermodynamics, galvanic cells
Materials Chemistry - Polymers, composites, nanomaterials
Water Chemistry and Environmental Chemistry - Water treatment, pollution control
Fuels and Combustion - Types of fuels, calorific value, combustion analysis

Principles of Programming Using C.description: Introduction to Programming, C Programming Basics, Functions and Arrays, Pointers and Strings
modules: Introduction to Programming - Problem-solving, algorithms, flowcharts
C Programming Basics - Data types, operators, control structures
Functions and Arrays - Function definition, array operations
Pointers and Strings - Pointer arithmetic, string manipulation
File Handling and Structures - File operations, user-defined data types

Mathematics for Computer Science.description: Set Theory and Relations, Mathematical Logic, Combinatorics, Graph Theory, Number Theory
modules: Set Theory and Relations - Set operations, relations, functions, equivalence relations
Mathematical Logic - Propositional logic, predicate logic, proof techniques
Combinatorics - Permutations, combinations, generating functions, recurrence relations
Graph Theory - Basic concepts, trees, connectivity, shortest paths
Number Theory - Divisibility, modular arithmetic, prime numbers, RSA algorithm

Digital Design & Computer Organization.description: Number Systems and Codes, Boolean Algebra and Logic Gates, Combinational and Sequential Logic
modules: Number Systems and Codes - Binary, octal, hexadecimal, BCD, Gray code
Boolean Algebra and Logic Gates - Boolean functions, Karnaugh maps, gate optimization
Combinational Logic Circuits - Adders, subtractors, multiplexers, decoders, encoders
Sequential Logic Circuits - Flip-flops, counters, registers, state machines
Computer Organization - CPU architecture, instruction formats, addressing modes

Operating Systems.description: Introduction to Operating Systems, Process Management, Memory Management, File Systems, I/O Management and Deadlocks
modules: Introduction to Operating Systems - Types, services, system calls, kernel architecture
Process Management - Process states, scheduling algorithms, process synchronization, inter-process communication
Memory Management - Paging, segmentation, virtual memory, page replacement algorithms
File Systems - File allocation methods, directory structures, file protection, file system implementation
I/O Management and Deadlocks - Device drivers, disk scheduling, deadlock prevention, detection and recovery

Data Structures and Applications.description: Introduction and Arrays, Linked Lists, Stacks and Queues, Trees, Graphs and Hashing
modules: Introduction and Arrays - Linear and non-linear data structures, array operations, time complexity analysis
Linked Lists - Singly, doubly, and circular linked lists, applications and implementations
Stacks and Queues - Implementation, applications, expression evaluation, queue variations
Trees - Binary trees, BST, AVL trees, heap, tree traversals, applications
Graphs and Hashing - Graph representation, traversal algorithms, hash functions, collision handling

Social Connect and Responsibility.description: Constitutional Values and Social Justice, Community Engagement, Environmental Awareness
modules: Constitutional Values and Social Justice - Fundamental rights, duties, equality
Community Engagement - Social service, rural development programs
Environmental Awareness - Climate change, sustainable development
Gender Sensitization - Gender equality, women empowerment
Professional Ethics - Engineering ethics, code of conduct

Analysis & Design of Algorithms.description: Algorithm Analysis, Divide and Conquer, Greedy Algorithms, Dynamic Programming, Graph Algorithms
modules: Algorithm Analysis - Time and space complexity, asymptotic notation, best/worst case
Divide and Conquer - Merge sort, quick sort, binary search, closest pair problem
Greedy Algorithms - Activity selection, fractional knapsack, Huffman coding
Dynamic Programming - Optimal substructure, 0/1 knapsack, longest common subsequence
Graph Algorithms - BFS, DFS, shortest path algorithms, minimum spanning tree

Microcontrollers.description: Introduction to Microcontrollers, 8051 Microcontroller Architecture, Programming, Interfacing
modules: Introduction to Microcontrollers - Architecture comparison, applications
8051 Microcontroller Architecture - Pin diagram, memory organization, SFRs
8051 Programming - Assembly language, instruction set, addressing modes
Interfacing Techniques - LED, switches, seven-segment displays, motors
Advanced Applications - Timers, interrupts, serial communication, real-time systems

Database Management Systems.description: Database Concepts, Relational Model, SQL Programming, Database Design, Transaction Management
modules: Database Concepts - Data models, database architecture, DBMS functions
Relational Model - Relations, keys, integrity constraints, relational algebra
SQL Programming - DDL, DML, DCL, queries, joins, subqueries, views
Database Design - ER modeling, normalization, functional dependencies
Transaction Management - ACID properties, concurrency control, recovery

Biology for Computer Engineers.description: Cell Biology and Genetics, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Biomimetics
modules: Cell Biology and Genetics - Cell structure, DNA, RNA, protein synthesis
Bioinformatics - Sequence analysis, database searching, phylogenetic analysis
Computational Biology - Algorithm design for biological problems
Biomimetics - Nature-inspired computing, swarm intelligence
Biotechnology Applications - Biometrics, medical informatics, drug discovery

Software Engineering & Project Managemen.description: Software Engineering Fundamentals, System Analysis and Design, Software Testing, Project Management
modules: Software Engineering Fundamentals - SDLC models, requirements engineering
System Analysis and Design - Design principles, architectural patterns, UML
Software Testing - Testing strategies, white-box, black-box testing, automation
Project Management - Project planning, scheduling, resource allocation, risk management
Software Quality and Maintenance - Quality metrics, configuration management, version control

Computer Networks.description: Network Fundamentals, Physical and Data Link Layer, Network Layer, Transport Layer, Application Layer
modules: Network Fundamentals - OSI model, TCP/IP protocol suite, network topologies
Physical and Data Link Layer - Transmission media, error detection and correction
Network Layer - IP addressing, subnetting, routing algorithms, ICMP
Transport Layer - TCP, UDP, flow control, congestion control, socket programming
Application Layer - HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, SMTP, DNS, network security basics

Theory of Computation.description: Finite Automata, Context-Free Languages, Turing Machines, Computability Theory, Complexity Theory
modules: Finite Automata - DFA, NFA, regular expressions, regular grammars
Context-Free Languages - CFG, Chomsky normal form, pushdown automata
Turing Machines - TM variants, Church-Turing thesis, recursive languages
Computability Theory - Decidability, undecidability, halting problem
Complexity Theory - Time and space complexity, P, NP, NP-complete problems

Cloud Computing.description: Cloud Computing Fundamentals, Cloud Architecture, Cloud Service Providers, Cloud Security
modules: Cloud Computing Fundamentals - Service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS), deployment models
Cloud Architecture - Virtualization, containerization, microservices
Cloud Service Providers - AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud Platform, services comparison
Cloud Security and Privacy - Authentication, encryption, compliance, data protection
Cloud Applications - Big data analytics, IoT in cloud, serverless computing

Machine Learning.description: Supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, model evaluation, and practical applications
modules: Supervised Learning - Linear/logistic regression, k-NN, Na√Øve Bayes, decision trees
Support Vector Machines - Maximum margin, kernel trick, multi-class classification
Decision Trees & Ensembles - Random Forest, boosting algorithms, bias-variance trade-off
Unsupervised Learning - K-means clustering, hierarchical clustering, PCA dimensionality reduction
Model Evaluation & Selection - Cross-validation, performance metrics, ROC curves, confusion matrix

Artificial Intelligence.description: AI Fundamentals, Knowledge Representation, Expert Systems, Machine Learning in AI, AI Applications
modules: AI Fundamentals - Problem-solving, search algorithms, heuristic search
Knowledge Representation - Logic, semantic networks, frames, ontologies
Expert Systems - Rule-based systems, inference engines, knowledge acquisition
Machine Learning in AI - Pattern recognition, neural networks, genetic algorithms
AI Applications - Natural language processing, computer vision, robotics

Mathematics for ECE.description: Transform Calculus, Fourier Series and Numerical Techniques for ECE applications
modules: Laplace Transform - Properties, inverse transforms, applications to differential equations
Fourier Series - Trigonometric and exponential series, half-range expansions
Fourier Transform - Properties, applications to signal processing
Z-Transform - Properties, inverse z-transforms, applications to discrete systems
Numerical Methods - Solution of algebraic and transcendental equations

Analog Electronics Circuits.description: Diode Circuits, BJT Amplifiers, FET Amplifiers, Op-Amp Applications, Oscillators and Multivibrators
modules: Diode Circuits - Rectifiers, clippers, clampers, voltage multipliers
BJT Amplifiers - CE, CB, CC configurations, bias stability, frequency response
FET Amplifiers - JFET and MOSFET amplifiers, bias circuits
Op-Amp Applications - Linear and non-linear applications, active filters
Oscillators and Multivibrators - RC, LC, crystal oscillators, astable multivibrators

Communication Systems.description: Analog Communication Systems, Modulation Techniques, Noise Analysis, Information Theory
modules: Amplitude Modulation - AM, DSB-SC, SSB-SC modulation and demodulation
Frequency and Phase Modulation - FM, PM generation and detection
Superheterodyne Receivers - AM and FM receiver architectures
Noise in Communication Systems - Noise analysis in AM and FM systems
Information Theory - Entropy, channel capacity, error correction codes

Microprocessors.description: 8086 Microprocessor Architecture, Assembly Language Programming, Interfacing Techniques
modules: 8086 Microprocessor Architecture - Internal architecture, pin diagram, memory segmentation
Instruction Set and Programming - Data transfer, arithmetic, logic, control instructions
Memory and I/O Interfacing - Memory interfacing, I/O mapped and memory mapped I/O
Interrupt Handling - Hardware and software interrupts, interrupt service routines
Applications and Case Studies - Microprocessor-based system design examples

Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Conduction Heat Transfer, Convection Heat Transfer, Radiation Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers
modules: Conduction Heat Transfer - Fourier's law, steady and unsteady conduction
Convection Heat Transfer - Forced and natural convection, boundary layer theory
Radiation Heat Transfer - Laws of radiation, radiation exchange between surfaces
Heat Exchangers - Types, LMTD and effectiveness-NTU methods
Mass Transfer Fundamentals - Diffusion, mass transfer coefficients

Fluid Mechanics.description: Fluid Properties and Statics, Fluid Kinematics, Fluid Dynamics, Flow through Pipes, Hydraulic Machines
modules: Fluid Properties and Statics - Density, viscosity, surface tension, hydrostatic pressure
Fluid Kinematics - Flow visualization, stream function, velocity potential
Fluid Dynamics - Euler's and Bernoulli's equations, momentum equation
Flow through Pipes - Laminar and turbulent flow, friction losses, pipe networks
Hydraulic Machines - Centrifugal pumps, turbines, performance characteristics

Power Systems.description: Power Generation, Transmission Systems, Distribution Systems, Load Flow Analysis, Fault Analysis
modules: Power Generation - Thermal, hydro, nuclear power plants, renewable energy sources
Transmission Systems - Transmission line parameters, modeling, performance
Distribution Systems - Radial and ring main distributors, voltage regulation
Load Flow Analysis - Bus admittance matrix, Gauss-Seidel, Newton-Raphson methods
Fault Analysis - Symmetrical and unsymmetrical faults, protection schemes

Structural Analysis.description: Statically Determinate Structures, Method of Joints and Sections, Deflection of Beams
modules: Statically Determinate Structures - Analysis of beams, frames, and trusses
Method of Joints and Sections - Truss analysis using equilibrium equations
Deflection of Beams - Moment-area method, conjugate beam method
Statically Indeterminate Structures - Force and displacement methods
Matrix Methods - Stiffness method, flexibility method

Information Storage and Retrieval.description: Information Retrieval Models, Indexing and Searching, Web Search Engines, Information Filtering
modules: Information Retrieval Models - Boolean, vector space, probabilistic models
Indexing and Searching - Inverted indexes, query processing, ranking algorithms
Web Search Engines - Crawling, indexing, PageRank algorithm
Information Filtering - Collaborative filtering, content-based filtering
Digital Libraries - Metadata, preservation, access control

Full Stack Development.description: Modern web development using front-end frameworks, RESTful/GraphQL APIs, databases, and deployment
modules: Front-end Foundations - Modern JavaScript ES6+, React fundamentals, component architecture
Back-end & APIs - Node.js, Express.js, RESTful API design, GraphQL basics
Databases & ORM - SQL/NoSQL databases, ORM concepts, query optimization
Auth & Security - JWT, OAuth2, security best practices, CORS, CSRF protection
Deployment & DevOps - Git workflows, CI/CD pipelines, Docker containerization, cloud deployment

Machine Learning.description: Supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, model evaluation, and practical applications
modules: Supervised Learning - Linear/logistic regression, k-NN, Na√Øve Bayes, decision trees

Decision Trees & Ensembles - Random Forest, boosting algorithms, bias-variance trade-off

Model Evaluation & Selection - Cross-validation, performance metrics, ROC curves, confusion matrix

modules: Cloud Models & Virtualization - IaaS/PaaS/SaaS, deployment models, containers vs VMs
Networking & Storage - VPC, security groups, load balancing, CDN, cloud storage types
Identity & Access Management - RBAC, ABAC, SSO, federated identity, principle of least privilege
Data Protection & Monitoring - Encryption at rest/transit, SIEM, vulnerability scanning, incident response
Compliance & Zero Trust - SOC 2, ISO 27001, GDPR, shared responsibility model, zero trust architecture

Renewable Energy & Power Plants.description: Renewable energy technologies, conventional power plants, grid integration, and economics
modules: Solar & Wind Energy - PV characteristics, MPPT, wind turbine power curves, Betz limit
Hydro & Biomass Energy - Hydroelectric systems, turbine selection, biomass conversion processes
Geothermal & Energy Storage - Geothermal systems, battery technologies, pumped storage, CAES
Conventional Power Plants - Steam power Rankine cycle, gas turbines, combined cycle efficiency
Grid Integration & Economics - Grid stability, LCOE calculations, capacity factor, environmental impact

Calculus and Linear Algebra.description: Differential calculus, integral calculus, differential equations, linear algebra fundamentals
modules: Differential Calculus - Limits, continuity, differentiation techniques
Integral Calculus - Integration methods, definite integrals, applications
Differential Equations - First order differential equations, linear equations
Matrices and Determinants - Matrix operations, eigenvalues, eigenvectors
Vector Spaces - Linear independence, basis, linear transformations

modules: Laplace Transform - Properties, inverse transforms, applications
Fourier Series - Trigonometric and exponential series
Fourier Transform - Properties and applications

modules: Introduction and Arrays - Data structure concepts, array operations
Linked Lists - Singly, doubly, circular linked lists
Stacks and Queues - Implementation and applications
Trees - Binary trees, BST, AVL trees, heap
Graphs and Hashing - Graph algorithms, hash tables

modules: Network Models and Protocols - OSI and TCP/IP models, protocol layering
Physical and Data Link Layer - Transmission media, error detection and correction
Network Layer - IP addressing, routing algorithms, ICMP
Transport Layer - TCP, UDP, flow and congestion control
Application Layer - HTTP, FTP, SMTP, DNS protocols

Database Management Systems.description: Database concepts, ER model, relational model, SQL, normalization, transaction processing
modules: Introduction to DBMS - Database concepts, architecture, data models
ER Model and Relational Model - Entity-relationship modeling, relational algebra
SQL and Database Design - SQL queries, joins, subqueries, views

Digital System Design using Verilog.description: Digital design concepts, Verilog HDL, combinational and sequential circuits
modules: Digital Design Fundamentals - Number systems, Boolean algebra, logic gates

Combinational Logic Design - Adders, multiplexers, decoders, encoders
Sequential Logic Design - Flip-flops, counters, registers, state machines

modules: Signals and Systems - Classification of signals, system properties
Fourier Analysis - Fourier series, Fourier transform, DFT

modules: Diode and Rectifier Circuits - Diode characteristics, rectifier circuits

modules: DC Circuit Analysis - Ohm's law, Kirchhoff's laws, nodal and mesh analysis
Network Theorems - Superposition, Thevenin's, Norton's, maximum power transfer
AC Circuit Analysis - Phasors, impedance, power in AC circuits

Cams and Followers - Cam profiles, motion curves, design

modules: Thermodynamic Cycles - Otto, Diesel, Rankine, Brayton cycles
Fluid Statics and Dynamics - Pressure, buoyancy, Bernoulli's equation
